name: @nodegui/nodegui
description: A cross platform library to build native desktop apps.
author: Atul R <atulanand94@gmail.com>

scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run test-copy && qode dist/src/demo.js
scripts.test-all: rm -rf dist && npx tsc & npm run test-copy && npm run test-ts && npm run test-js
scripts.test: npm run test-copy && npm run test-ts
scripts.test-watch: npx watch "npm run test-ts" src spec --interval 5
scripts.test-copy: mkdir -p dist/build/Release && cp -r build/Release/* dist/build/Release/ && mkdir -p dist/extras/assets && cp extras/assets/* dist/extras/assets/
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test-all
scripts.all-from-scratch: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install && npm run all
scripts.prepare: npm run prettier && npm run build
